author: Kelli Acciardo
title: Latin-Inspired Mug Cake Recipes
text:
Put the caf√© con leche aside and consider the coffee cup for another purpose: ready-in-minutes mug cakes . Flavors like avocado brownie, mango coconut, tres leches, and chocolate quinoa banana can be achieved with just a few ingredients and mere minutes in the microwave, perfect for when the craving for something sweet strikes and you have to satisfy it STAT. So scroll through these delicious recipes and get inspired to try one right now!
